entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind light except west 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of showers late this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches in low lying areas before morning. Wind light except west 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 17 except 23 inland.
